name: Escape The Nightmare (Strumbi) (Strumbi)
description:
Escape The Nightmare is first person horror game where you need to gain your memory back by facing fears in your dreams. Every single nightmare is connected with main characters family.

AUTO SAVE IS ON!!!

Controls:

WASD - movement

E - activate or pick up stuff

left click - flashlight

Shift - sprint

CTRL - crouch 

By hiding behind the statues monster will go away.
